This is such a gem.  As a first-timer, it was a bit overwhelming...but once you figure it out, it's amazing!  I love that there are different distinct restaurants within the building.  We chose the tapas one.  I LOVE the concept!  You pick our cold tapas - then you wait for the hot ones!  Every few minutes a waiter will come out from the kitchen with a tray of a specific hot dish.  They yell out which one it is - and if you want it - you raise your hand and claim one!  Each tray has anywhere from 1 -5 dishes on it, so you have to be fast if it's something you like!  It was tough, as we don't speak Catalan and had no idea what anything was - BUT, I'll eat anything, so it was a great way to try new foods.  Prices were very reasonable.  Only complaint - their sangria is a bottled version.  Not home made.  I will definately go back when in Barca!
